cleaning up an earlier post ,


 listing some great, freaky, and ultra rare one-of-a-kind 206 printers scraps....

priced very reasonably.....please email me with your interest:)

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]





MCQUILLAN SGC "Blank Back" 

the only one in existence!  own a 1 of 1 ! 

Super clean back/No creases/rare blank back 

$1,200.00


STAHL SGC "Blank Back"

the only one in existence! own a one of 1 ! 

Super clean back/No creases/rare blank back
$1,200.00


SWEENEY SGC "COLOR VARIATION" Yellow / Brown 460 fact #30 no print

another amazing, highly sought after "yellow/brown printer scrap" very popular scrap, a "no print" missing most of the color not printed....

check out the auction acquired from B + L:

[url]http://brockelmanauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=3089[/url]

$1,100.00       SOLD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!



ARELLANES SGC "MISSING INK"

WOW! A very Dramatic scrap.....missing ink big time! bright reds/baby blue background make this card "pop" SICK SCRAP:eek:

$1,200.00       SOLD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

these are very unique....


STARR "SGC GHOST IMAGE"

Nice oversized, whacky border, card has a triple struck magenta image of starr on front even printed into the wide border!:eek: much better in person

$1,000.00

SLEEPY BILL BURNS sgc "authentic" WILD SCRAP!

this card has everything going on with it!   part name at top/ part next card on front lower right/ reverse image way offset on right/ crazy borders/ a very unique and dramatic card ! when the printer saw this , he knew it had to be scrapped...

$1,000.00

and very strange!;)  email me with interests


ROSSMAN "SGC AUTHENTIC"

Huge strange high blue eyebrows/ missing a print layer/ wacky wide borders/ over standard size! cool ass card

$1,000.00



GRIFFITH RAW "OAKS TOBACCO ADD UNDERPRINTED ON BACK"

HOFER! part of a puzzle piece basically/ has part of a hand/ 2 sets of acorns/ and another symbol/ there are a few other examples out there, when put together will show a 1909 tobacco ad for "oakes tobacco"
printed while 206's where printed at American litho in NYC

$550.00

smaller scraps.....priced to sell....


MCLEAN "SGC AUTHENTIC "

HUGE weird borders/ missing a layer ink / nice card

priced to move

$275.00



SPADE RAW

WILD wacky HUGE ASS borders! cool card

$275.00


MCLEAN "SGC AUTHENTIC"

huge , oversized hand cut borders

$250.00
